items.title: Istanbul peace talks resume as Russia reels from surprise Ukraine drone attack
items.description: Ukrainian and Russian delegations are set to meet again in Istanbul, Turkey, on Monday to take part in the next round of U.S.-brokered peace talks.

items.title: Britain getting a defense boost aimed at sending a message to Moscow, and to Trump
items.description: The U.K. will build new nuclear-powered attack submarines and create an army ready to fight a war in Europe as part of a boost to military spending

items.title: Boulder attack updates: Suspect booked on charges after 'act of terror'
items.description: Police in Colorado are responding to a "heinous" attack at a pedestrian mall in the city that they say left several victims.

items.title: WATCH:  Wildfires in Canada trigger air quality alerts across the Midwest
items.description: Canada declared a state of emergency due to the wildfires, forcing thousands to evacuate their homes.

items.title: WFP's Cindy McCain: Gaza could be 'a humanitarian catastrophe ... like none other’
items.description: On “This Week,” World Food Programme's Cindy McCain discusses efforts to distribute aid in Gaza.
